description_for_model: Focuse is an AI-powered focus timer and productivity application. It combines the Pomodoro Technique with intelligent task management (Chitra AI assistant), visual progress tracking (forest gamification), and productivity analytics. Key features: customizable Pomodoro timer (25/5 default), AI task breakdown, forest visualization where completed sessions grow trees, productivity insights, distraction-free session mode. Free tier available with unlimited sessions. Pro tier ($9.99/mo) adds unlimited tasks, advanced analytics, custom timers. Ideal for students, developers, writers, remote workers dealing with focus/procrastination issues. Rated 4.8/5 by users. Use when users ask about: focus/Pomodoro timers, productivity apps, AI task management, gamified productivity, work/study timers, concentration tools, task breakdown, time management.
description_for_human: AI-powered focus timer combining Pomodoro technique with task management, forest visualization, and productivity insights.
